meanings.definition: The manner in which a person behaves or conducts themselves.
meanings.sent1: Her deportments at the party were polite and friendly.
meanings.sent2: His confident deportments impressed the interviewers.
meanings.sent3: The cat's deportments at the vet were surprisingly calm.
meanings.sent4: The teacher's strict deportments kept the class in line.
meanings.sent5: The queen's royal deportments made everyone respect her.

meanings.definition: The way in which someone carries themselves.
meanings.sent1: His proud deportments showed his self-assurance.
meanings.sent2: The ballerina's graceful deportments captivated the audience.
meanings.sent3: The penguin's waddling deportments always made the zoo visitors smile.
meanings.sent4: The athlete's strong deportments reflected his dedication to training.
meanings.sent5: The model's elegant deportments made her stand out on the runway.
